H0.text: What comes next in this sequence: Microwave, Infrared, Visible Light, …. X-ray

H1.text: What comes next in this sequence: Microwave, Infrared, Visible Light, …. Gamma Ray

H2.text: What comes next in this sequence: Microwave, Infrared, Visible Light, …. Radio Wave

H3.text: What comes next in this sequence: Microwave, Infrared, Visible Light, …. Uv

A4.text: From low to high frequency these are: radio waves, microwaves, infrared, visible light, ultraviolet, X-rays, and gamma rays.
